reviews.sentence: Execelent if flying out of Frankfurt Int Airport. The reason I gave the overall rating of 4 is because the signage to lead one to the rooms is in my opinion is unclear and incomplete. Staff was very helpful and did take us to our room when we could not locate it. We chose this hotel because of its location at the airport and both regional and long distance rail lines which made our journey back to the states unhurried and relaxing after visiting relatives in Southern Germany. All staff at the desk in the restaurants and bars speak fluent English and the menus are also printed with English below the German making ordering a breeze. Very clean and inviting facility. Distance to rail airport onsite restaurants and bars signage for locating rooms.
Sheraton frankfurt airport. we only stayed one night before our plane departure. Excellent staff and room was perfect. It was difficult to find the entrance to the hotel. Better signage is required.

Nice Hotel with perfect location for travelers. The two reasons this hotel lost one star from me was its layout and finding a restuarent and lift lobbies complicated. Needs some sprucing and secondy is paid wifi which in this age and day is saying a room without a bedThe rooms are excelent the showers are excelent room servuce is excelent the bar and bar tendor is excellent. Pricey on their food and drinks but will stay again.

Very convenient hotel. If you have to stay at an airport hotel this is a very good option. Easy walking distance to Terminal 1 Star Alliance Carriers and a shuttle away from Terminal 2. Very quiet hotel and no noise to speak of from airplanes taking off or landing. Good service and the Lounge is very nice on the 9th floor. You get access to the Lounge as an SPG AX card holder which is a nice benefit. Very friendly and efficient staff.

Very Nice and Helpful. I had a long day of travel and my delayed flight caused me to miss my connection to the USA. So I stayed at the airport hotel overnight. As I was walking over the bridge to the hotel and struggling a bit with a bag a gentleman asked me if I needed help with my bags. He worked for the hotel and he introduced himself as Bilal. Bilal was wonderful and helped me take up everything to my room and turned on the lights etc. He made me feel very welcome and did a great job. Also the room service was great and at the room within 25 minutes. Good stay overall.
The place to stay for Frankfurt Airport. Very close to airport and great staff. No minus points.

Director of PMO. Was passing through Frankfurt Germany on business and chose the Sheraton as a place to pass the time after a hard week. I dropped into the Cigar lounge and found the service and atmosphere the perfect answer to relax. Thanks to the staff for the great conversation and wonderful service Salem. I look forward to my next visit.

Great customer service. Very good location it is in between the airport and train station. When I arrived everyone was friendly and helping. the hotel staff named David was super kind and helped me with all my questions and gave me advice on what restaurants i should eat at. the bellhop bilal was also welcoming and friendly and helped me with my bags.

the glass house we proudlyserve starbucks. many thanks to mr ben nhila the guy from tunisia how serve me and my colegues from China he take really care of us it was a very important meeting ben was helpful and very customer oriented Service if you want a take a break visit ben at the Lobby area the Lobby was also very clean we do nt had a romthanks ben.
Nice good service.

Almost every aspect of the stay was up to standard and met expectations. The check in staff the reception was exceptional and the ladies at the concierge were also very friendly helpful and accommodating to questions and requests. The male staff who delivered my room service was impertinent almost on the verge of antagonizing. I asked how long room service for my night meal would be and I was told 20 mins. So I step out of the room briefly when I returned the staff was standing outside my door and was scolding me for making him stand there over 5 mins that I should wait in my room and never leave. Direct quote from him.

Pleasant. One of the hotel staff interupted me when I was getting on the elevator despite I was waiting before. He said “ wait next one ”. The hotel was not bad but the staff made a bad memory for me and I will never use the hotel.

can not beat the location. If you are flying into or out of Frankfurt Airport you can not find a more conveniently located hotel. You will not even have to step outside the terminal. And a train station and bus stop are just steps away. Our room was comfortable and clean. Our only complaint was that the staff seemed annoyed at having to help us at times sighing and smirking while answering our questions.

The location was very convenient and most suitable for the tripThe cleanliness of the room. Staff disinterested when approached with enquiries regarding available facilities. The inaccurate description of available facilities on line in particular the wellness centre and spa gym facilities.

Terrible. Just terrible. I unfortunately got stuck staying at this hotel due to flight delays that caused me to miss my connecting international flights. It took around 1 hour to check in due to the large queue of people waiting. To give them credit this may have been due to masses of people in line with missed connections but when I asked the lady at the front desk she said it is always like that especially at that time of day. so perhaps they need more staff at that time of day. On checking in I ordered room service. It came fairly quickly and good quality food although he forgot half my order and had to come back later. The rooms are extremely old dated and smell dank. The bathroom resembled a one star motel with literally a makeshift board covering up the pipes for the sink. Appalling. this brand is going down hill. In the morning I woke up at the crack of down to drilling and construction noises after having only a few hours sleep. I tried to call guest services called 3 times with no answer. Finally someone picked up and offered to move my room. Given I was checking out in only a few hours the idea of gathering my stuff moving and trying to get back to sleep was ludicrous especially since I ’d been up for 40 minutes trying to call them to get moved. The lady on the phone was so lovely but the issue was out of her control. What a lousy crappy experience. And only confirms what I will never do as a traveller stay in crappy hotel chains that are old shabby and have 0 consideration for their guests needs. Terrible. Just terrible.
Location. The service is getting worse. Toiletries are not replaced and towels not changed. Noise in the corridors are disturbing but I guess it was mainly due to main room being near the lifts.

The reason I downgraded check in was because it took 45 minutes to figure out how to find the hotel reception area. There is no outside entrance to the hotel entry is from the airport. There were no signs or directions in this huge airportof how to find the hotel entrance. Once at reception getting signed in and getting a room for most was a slow process with long lines of people waiting their turn. Since my wife was in a wheel chair the bellman brought us to the front of the.
The politeness of this hotel need improvement check in process was slow and the service quality of this hotel was poor. This is not what we expected for sheraton.

Hotel is renovated beds are cozy and clean. Nonetheless the staff is not very friendly and the prices for food are a little high. There is a fridge in the room that you can not use unles you give a deposit which is very inconvenient.

Poor. Nothing except location to the airport. Waited 30minutes plus to check in and then Rude staff to check in very slow. Then get to the room card keys do n’t work. Again back to reception. So long to check in facilities like restaurant closed. Rooms service delivered the wrong food which I then had to eat no other choice and dry salad no dressing etc even provided. Asked for a quiet room 4 months before staying and was sandwiched between two families with kids who where noisy. Whilst you can hear the planes at night you certainly hear the people in the next room switched light switches showed etc. you would be better to pay for an airport lounge or stay in business class lounge than attend this hotel.
